variables.name: CONTENT_URI
variables.comment: * The content:// style URL for this table

variables.name: CONTENT_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type of {@link #CONTENT_URI} providing a directory of words.

variables.name: CONTENT_ITEM_TYPE
variables.comment: * The MIME type of a {@link #CONTENT_URI} sub-directory of a single word.

variables.name: FREQUENCY
variables.comment:
* The frequency column. A value between 1 and 255. Higher values imply higher frequency. *

TYPE: INTEGER

variables.name: LOCALE
variables.comment:
* The locale that this word belongs to. Null if it pertains to all * locales. Locale is as defined by the string returned by Locale.toString(). *

TYPE: TEXT

variables.name: APP_ID
variables.comment:
* The uid of the application that inserted the word. *

TYPE: INTEGER

variables.name: SHORTCUT
variables.comment:
* An optional shortcut for this word. When the shortcut is typed, supporting IMEs should
         * suggest the word in this row as an alternate spelling too.

variables.name: DEFAULT_SORT_ORDER
variables.comment: * Sort by descending order of frequency.

methods.name: public static void addWord(Context context, String word, int frequency, int localeType)
methods.comment:
Adds a word to the dictionary, with the given frequency and the specified
         *  specified locale type.
         *
         *  @deprecated Please use
         *  {@link #addWord(Context, String, int, String, Locale)} instead.
         *
         *  @param context the current application context
         *  @param word the word to add to the dictionary. This should not be null or
         *  empty.
         *  @param localeType the locale type for this word. It should be one of
         *  {@link #LOCALE_TYPE_ALL} or {@link #LOCALE_TYPE_CURRENT}.

methods.name: public static void addWord(Context context, String word, int frequency, String shortcut, Locale locale)
methods.comment:
Adds a word to the dictionary, with the given frequency and the specified
         *  locale type.
         *
         *  @param context the current application context
         *  @param word the word to add to the dictionary. This should not be null or
         *  empty.
         *  @param shortcut optional shortcut spelling for this word. When the shortcut
         *  is typed, the word may be suggested by applications that support it. May be null.
         *  @param locale the locale to insert the word for, or null to insert the word
         *  for all locales.

methodNames: public static void addWord(Context context, String word, int frequency, int localeType)
public static void addWord(Context context, String word, int frequency, String shortcut, Locale locale)
